title: Reality therapy and discipline at home
creator_contributor_role: Institute of Reality Therapy, Educator Training Centre, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Behavior modification
description: Episode number 2 of Series "Help for parents". Designed to provide ideas for developing parenting skills to help young people evaluate their behaviour and to plan more acceptable alternatives. Dr William Glasser interviews Tom McGuiness presenting the basic practices used in the Parent Involvement Program at the Institute of Reality Therapy, Educator Training Centre in Los Angeles. Demonstrates how each step is applied in the parent-child relationship.
related_objects: Series; S01151; Help for parents; Active; 1977
